practice_phrases.target: I want to start learning now.
I'm going to start practising soon.
I want to start speaking English.

practice_phrases.known: 我今天晚上要开始和你说话。
practice_phrases.target: I'm going to start speaking with you this evening.

practice_phrases.known: 因为我想学习，所以我要开始了。
practice_phrases.target: Because I want to learn, I'm going to start.

practice_phrases.known: 我猜我很快就要开始认识人了。
practice_phrases.target: I guess I'm going to start meeting people soon.

practice_phrases.known: 我很快就要开始尽我所能地练习了。
practice_phrases.target: I'm going to start practising as hard as I can soon.
